sh:property.sh:description: A short summary of the specific claims reviewed in a ClaimReview.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Claim review
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A fact-checking review of claims made (or reported) in some creative work (referenced via itemReviewed).

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:property.sh:name: priceSpecification
sh:property.sh:description: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.

sh:property.sh:name: price
sh:property.sh:description:
The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

Usage guidelines:

* Use the [[priceCurrency]] property (with [ISO 4217 codes](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) e.g. "USD") instead of including [ambiguous symbols](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dollar_sign#Currencies_that_use_the_dollar_or_peso_sign) such as '$' in the value.
* Use '.' (Unicode 'FULL STOP' (U+002E)) rather than ',' to indicate a decimal point. Avoid using these symbols as a readability separator.
* Note that both [RDFa](http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml-rdfa-primer/#using-the-content-attribute) and Microdata syntax allow the use of a "content=" attribute for publishing simple machine-readable values alongside more human-friendly formatting.
* Use values from 0123456789 (Unicode 'DIGIT ZERO' (U+0030) to 'DIGIT NINE' (U+0039)) rather than superficially similiar Unicode symbols.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Trade action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of participating in an exchange of goods and services for monetary compensation. An agent trades an object, product or service with a participant in exchange for a one time or periodic payment.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Pay action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An agent pays a price to a participant.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Apartment complex
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Residence type: Apartment complex.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Crematorium
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A crematorium.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Use action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of applying an object to its intended purpose.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Wear action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of dressing oneself in clothing.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Plumber
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A plumbing service.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: GLEIF
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: The implementation and use of Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) is supported by Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation [https://www.gleif.org](https://www.gleif.org).

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: Action collab class
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: The schema.org Actions mechanism benefited from extensive discussions across the Web standards community around W3C, in particular from the [Hydra project](http://purl.org/hydra/)'s community group.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Comedy club
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A comedy club.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: Stack Exchange
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: The Question/Answer types were [based on](https://www.w3.org/wiki/WebSchemas/QASchemaResearch) the Stack Overflow API.

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Saturday
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: The day of the week between Friday and Sunday.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Golf course
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A golf course.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: User plays
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use [[Action]]-based vocabulary, alongside types such as [[Comment]].

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Bus reservation
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A reservation for bus travel. \n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, use [[Offer]].

sh:property.sh:name: steps
sh:property.sh:description: The steps in the form of a single item (text, document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: How to section
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A sub-grouping of steps in the instructions for how to achieve a result (e.g. steps for making a pie crust within a pie recipe).

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: r news
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: This class contains derivatives of IPTC rNews properties. rNews is a data model of publishing metadata with serializations currently available for RDFa as well as HTML5 Microdata. More information about the IPTC and rNews can be found at [rnews.org](http://rnews.org).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: On demand event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A publication event e.g. catch-up TV or radio podcast, during which a program is available on-demand.

schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:label: Event rescheduled
schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:comment: The event has been rescheduled. The event's previousStartDate should be set to the old date and the startDate should be set to the event's new date. (If the event has been rescheduled multiple times, the previousStartDate property may be repeated).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: WPAd block
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An advertising section of the page.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Drink action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of swallowing liquids.

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Return action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of returning to the origin that which was previously received (concrete objects) or taken (ownership).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Government office
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A government office—for example, an IRS or DMV office.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Post office
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A post office.

schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:label: Online only
schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is available only online.

schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:label: Event cancelled
schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:comment: The event has been cancelled. If the event has multiple startDate values, all are assumed to be cancelled. Either startDate or previousStartDate may be used to specify the event's cancelled date(s).

schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:label: Pre sale
schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is available for ordering and delivery before general availability.

sh:property.sh:name: candidate
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of object. The candidate subject of this action.

sh:property.sh:name: option
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of object. The options subject to this action.

sh:property.sh:name: actionOption
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of object. The options subject to this action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Choose action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of expressing a preference from a set of options or a large or unbounded set of choices/options.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Vote action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of expressing a preference from a fixed/finite/structured set of choices/options.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Radio channel
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A unique instance of a radio BroadcastService on a CableOrSatelliteService lineup.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Electronics store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An electronics store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Ocean body of water
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An ocean (for example, the Pacific).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Movie rental store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A movie rental store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Zoo
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A zoo.

sh:property.sh:name: occupancy
sh:property.sh:description: The allowed total occupancy for the accommodation in persons (including infants etc). For individual accommodations, this is not necessarily the legal maximum but defines the permitted usage as per the contractual agreement (e.g. a double room used by a single person). Typical unit code(s): C62 for person

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfRooms
sh:property.sh:description: The number of rooms (excluding bathrooms and closets) of the acccommodation or lodging business. Typical unit code(s): ROM for room or C62 for no unit. The type of room can be put in the unitText property of the QuantitativeValue.

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfRooms
sh:property.sh:description: The number of rooms (excluding bathrooms and closets) of the acccommodation or lodging business. Typical unit code(s): ROM for room or C62 for no unit. The type of room can be put in the unitText property of the QuantitativeValue.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: House
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A house is a building or structure that has the ability to be occupied for habitation by humans or other creatures (Source: Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/House).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Single family residence
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Residence type: Single-family home.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Exhibition event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Exhibition event, e.g. at a museum, library, archive, tradeshow, ...

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Legislative building
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A legislative building—for example, the state capitol.

sh:property.sh:name: resultReview
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of result. The review that resulted in the performing of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Review action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of producing a balanced opinion about the object for an audience. An agent reviews an object with participants resulting in a review.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Parcel service
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
A private parcel service as the delivery mode available for a certain offer.

Commonly used values:

* http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#DHL
* http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#FederalExpress
* http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#UPS

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Want action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of expressing a desire about the object. An agent wants an object.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Health club
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A health club.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Hardware store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A hardware store.

schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:label: Event postponed
schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:comment: The event has been postponed and no new date has been set. The event's previousStartDate should be set.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Park
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A park.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Animal shelter
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Animal shelter.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Listen action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of consuming audio content.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Draw action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of producing a visual/graphical representation of an object, typically with a pen/pencil and paper as instruments.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Spreadsheet digital document
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A spreadsheet file.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Auto body shop
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Auto body shop.

sh:property.sh:name: deliveryMethod
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. The method of delivery.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Track action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
An agent tracks an object for updates.

Related actions:

* [[FollowAction]]: Unlike FollowAction, TrackAction refers to the interest on the location of innanimates objects.
* [[SubscribeAction]]: Unlike SubscribeAction, TrackAction refers to the interest on the location of innanimate objects.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Accept action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of committing to/adopting an object.

Related actions:

* [[RejectAction]]: The antonym of AcceptAction.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Aquarium
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Aquarium.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Float
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Data type: Floating number.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Computer store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A computer store.

sh:property.sh:name: entertainmentBusiness
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of location. The entertainment business where the action occurred.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Perform action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of participating in performance arts.

schema:BookFormatType.rdfs:label: Audiobook format
schema:BookFormatType.rdfs:comment: Book format: Audiobook. This is an enumerated value for use with the bookFormat property. There is also a type 'Audiobook' in the bib extension which includes Audiobook specific properties.

schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:label: New condition
schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is new.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Food service
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A food service, like breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:label: Reservation hold
schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:comment: The status of a reservation on hold pending an update like credit card number or flight changes.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Checkout page
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Web page type: Checkout page.

sh:property.sh:name: toLocation
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of location. The final location of the object or the agent after the action.

sh:property.sh:name: fromLocation
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of location. The original location of the object or the agent before the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Move action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of an agent relocating to a place.

Related actions:

* [[TransferAction]]: Unlike TransferAction, the subject of the move is a living Person or Organization rather than an inanimate object.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Depart action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of departing from a place. An agent departs from an fromLocation for a destination, optionally with participants.

schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:label: Kosher diet
schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:comment: A diet conforming to Jewish dietary practices.

sh:property.sh:name: resultComment
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of result. The Comment created or sent as a result of this action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Comment action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of generating a comment about a subject.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Locker delivery
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A DeliveryMethod in which an item is made available via locker.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Text
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Data type: Text.

sh:property.sh:name: jobLocation
sh:property.sh:description: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Job posting

sh:property.sh:name: workHours
sh:property.sh:description: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A listing that describes a job opening in a certain organization.

sh:property.sh:name: validThrough
sh:property.sh:description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

sh:property.sh:name: responsibilities
sh:property.sh:description: Responsibilities associated with this role.

sh:property.sh:name: salaryCurrency
sh:property.sh:description: The currency (coded using [ISO 4217](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.

sh:property.sh:name: industry
sh:property.sh:description: The industry associated with the job position.

sh:property.sh:name: occupationalCategory
sh:property.sh:description: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.

sh:property.sh:name: incentiveCompensation
sh:property.sh:description: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.

sh:property.sh:name: baseSalary
sh:property.sh:description: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.

sh:property.sh:name: datePosted
sh:property.sh:description: Publication date for the job posting.

sh:property.sh:name: specialCommitments
sh:property.sh:description: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.

sh:property.sh:name: jobBenefits
sh:property.sh:description: Description of benefits associated with the job.

sh:property.sh:name: employmentType
sh:property.sh:description: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).

sh:property.sh:name: educationRequirements
sh:property.sh:description: Educational background needed for the position.

sh:property.sh:name: qualifications
sh:property.sh:description: Specific qualifications required for this role.

sh:property.sh:name: benefits
sh:property.sh:description: Description of benefits associated with the job.

sh:property.sh:name: title
sh:property.sh:description: The title of the job.

sh:property.sh:name: experienceRequirements
sh:property.sh:description: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.

sh:property.sh:name: hiringOrganization
sh:property.sh:description: Organization offering the job position.

sh:property.sh:name: incentives
sh:property.sh:description: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.

sh:property.sh:name: skills
sh:property.sh:description: Skills required to fulfill this role.

sh:property.sh:name: proficiencyLevel
sh:property.sh:description: Proficiency needed for this content; expected values: 'Beginner', 'Expert'.

sh:property.sh:name: dependencies
sh:property.sh:description: Prerequisites needed to fulfill steps in article.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Tech article
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A technical article - Example: How-to (task) topics, step-by-step, procedural troubleshooting, specifications, etc.

sh:property.sh:name: assembly
sh:property.sh:description: Library file name e.g., mscorlib.dll, system.web.dll.

sh:property.sh:name: targetPlatform
sh:property.sh:description: Type of app development: phone, Metro style, desktop, XBox, etc.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: APIReference

sh:property.sh:name: executableLibraryName
sh:property.sh:description: Library file name e.g., mscorlib.dll, system.web.dll.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Reference documentation for application programming interfaces (APIs).

sh:property.sh:name: assemblyVersion
sh:property.sh:description: Associated product/technology version. e.g., .NET Framework 4.5.

sh:property.sh:name: programmingModel
sh:property.sh:description: Indicates whether API is managed or unmanaged.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Brewery
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Brewery.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Ice cream shop
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An ice cream shop.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Apply action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of registering to an organization/service without the guarantee to receive it.

Related actions:

* [[RegisterAction]]: Unlike RegisterAction, ApplyAction has no guarantees that the application will be accepted.

sh:property.sh:name: gamePlatform
sh:property.sh:description: The electronic systems used to play video games.

sh:property.sh:name: quest
sh:property.sh:description: The task that a player-controlled character, or group of characters may complete in order to gain a reward.

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfEpisodes
sh:property.sh:description: The number of episodes in this season or series.

sh:property.sh:name: actor
sh:property.sh:description: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:property.sh:name: gameItem
sh:property.sh:description: An item is an object within the game world that can be collected by a player or, occasionally, a non-player character.

sh:property.sh:name: cheatCode
sh:property.sh:description: Cheat codes to the game.

sh:property.sh:name: director
sh:property.sh:description: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:property.sh:name: trailer
sh:property.sh:description: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

sh:property.sh:name: playMode
sh:property.sh:description: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player. The game can be marked as multi-player, co-op and single-player at the same time.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Game play mode
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player.

sh:property.sh:name: actors
sh:property.sh:description: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfPlayers
sh:property.sh:description: Indicate how many people can play this game (minimum, maximum, or range).

sh:property.sh:name: characterAttribute
sh:property.sh:description: A piece of data that represents a particular aspect of a fictional character (skill, power, character points, advantage, disadvantage).

sh:property.sh:name: gameLocation
sh:property.sh:description: Real or fictional location of the game (or part of game).

sh:property.sh:name: episode
sh:property.sh:description: An episode of a tv, radio or game media within a series or season.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A video game series.

sh:property.sh:name: episodes
sh:property.sh:description: An episode of a TV/radio series or season.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Video game series

sh:property.sh:name: containsSeason
sh:property.sh:description: A season that is part of the media series.

sh:property.sh:name: seasons
sh:property.sh:description: A season in a media series.

sh:property.sh:name: productionCompany
sh:property.sh:description: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.

sh:property.sh:name: season
sh:property.sh:description: A season in a media series.

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfSeasons
sh:property.sh:description: The number of seasons in this series.

sh:property.sh:name: musicBy
sh:property.sh:description: The composer of the soundtrack.

sh:property.sh:name: directors
sh:property.sh:description: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video games etc. content. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: HVACBusiness
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A business that provide Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning services.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Liquor store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A shop that sells alcoholic drinks such as wine, beer, whisky and other spirits.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Check out action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of an agent communicating (service provider, social media, etc) their departure of a previously reserved service (e.g. flight check in) or place (e.g. hotel).

Related actions:

* [[CheckInAction]]: The antonym of CheckOutAction.
* [[DepartAction]]: Unlike DepartAction, CheckOutAction implies that the agent is informing/confirming the end of a previously reserved service.
* [[CancelAction]]: Unlike CancelAction, CheckOutAction implies that the agent is informing/confirming the end of a previously reserved service.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Marry action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of marrying a person.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Sale event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Sales event.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Reject action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of rejecting to/adopting an object.

Related actions:

* [[AcceptAction]]: The antonym of RejectAction.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Lake body of water
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A lake (for example, Lake Pontrachain).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Achieve action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of accomplishing something via previous efforts. It is an instantaneous action rather than an ongoing process.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Tie action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of reaching a draw in a competitive activity.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Sporting goods store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A sporting goods store.

sh:property.sh:name: warrantyPromise
sh:property.sh:description: The warranty promise(s) included in the offer.

sh:property.sh:name: vendor
sh:property.sh:description: 'vendor' is an earlier term for 'seller'.

sh:property.sh:name: seller
sh:property.sh:description: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods. A seller may also be a provider.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Buy action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of giving money to a seller in exchange for goods or services rendered. An agent buys an object, product, or service from a seller for a price. Reciprocal of SellAction.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Convenience store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A convenience store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: How to step
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A step in the instructions for how to achieve a result. It is an ordered list with HowToDirection and/or HowToTip items.

sh:property.sh:name: yearsInOperation
sh:property.sh:description: The age of the business.

sh:property.sh:name: yearlyRevenue
sh:property.sh:description: The size of the business in annual revenue.

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfEmployees
sh:property.sh:description: The number of employees in an organization e.g. business.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Business audience
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A set of characteristics belonging to businesses, e.g. who compose an item's target audience.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Befriend action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of forming a personal connection with someone (object) mutually/bidirectionally/symmetrically.

Related actions:

* [[FollowAction]]: Unlike FollowAction, BefriendAction implies that the connection is reciprocal.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Ignore action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of intentionally disregarding the object. An agent ignores an object.

schema:GamePlayMode.rdfs:label: Multi player
schema:GamePlayMode.rdfs:comment: Play mode: MultiPlayer. Requiring or allowing multiple human players to play simultaneously.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Movie clip
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A short segment/part of a movie.

sh:property.sh:name: event
sh:property.sh:description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Join action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
An agent joins an event/group with participants/friends at a location.

Related actions:

* [[RegisterAction]]: Unlike RegisterAction, JoinAction refers to joining a group/team of people.
* [[SubscribeAction]]: Unlike SubscribeAction, JoinAction does not imply that you'll be receiving updates.
* [[FollowAction]]: Unlike FollowAction, JoinAction does not imply that you'll be polling for updates.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Theater event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Theater performance.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Date time
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm] (see Chapter 5.4 of ISO 8601).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Event venue
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An event venue.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: Automotive ontology WGClass
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: This element is based on the work of the Automotive Ontology Working Group, see [www.automotive-ontology.org](http://www.automotive-ontology.org) for details. Many class and property definitions are inspired by or based on abstracts from Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Festival
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Festival.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: User blocks
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use [[Action]]-based vocabulary, alongside types such as [[Comment]].

sh:property.sh:name: occupancy
sh:property.sh:description: The allowed total occupancy for the accommodation in persons (including infants etc). For individual accommodations, this is not necessarily the legal maximum but defines the permitted usage as per the contractual agreement (e.g. a double room used by a single person). Typical unit code(s): C62 for person

sh:property.sh:name: bed
sh:property.sh:description: The type of bed or beds included in the accommodation. For the single case of just one bed of a certain type, you use bed directly with a text. If you want to indicate the quantity of a certain kind of bed, use an instance of BedDetails. For more detailed information, use the amenityFeature property.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Hotel room
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
A hotel room is a single room in a hotel.

See also the dedicated document on the use of schema.org for marking up hotels and other forms of accommodations.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Parking facility
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A parking lot or other parking facility.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Outlet store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An outlet store.

schema:SteeringPositionValue.rdfs:label: Left hand driving
schema:SteeringPositionValue.rdfs:comment: The steering position is on the left side of the vehicle (viewed from the main direction of driving).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Defence establishment
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A defence establishment, such as an army or navy base.

sh:property.sh:name: scheduledTime
sh:property.sh:description: The time the object is scheduled to.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Plan action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of planning the execution of an event/task/action/reservation/plan to a future date.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Schedule action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
Scheduling future actions, events, or tasks.

Related actions:

* [[ReserveAction]]: Unlike ReserveAction, ScheduleAction allocates future actions (e.g. an event, a task, etc) towards a time slot / spatial allocation.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: WPHeader
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The header section of the page.

sh:property.sh:name: recipe
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. The recipe/instructions used to perform the action.

sh:property.sh:name: ingredients
sh:property.sh:description: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.

sh:property.sh:name: cookingMethod
sh:property.sh:description: The method of cooking, such as Frying, Steaming, ...

sh:property.sh:name: recipeIngredient
sh:property.sh:description: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.

sh:property.sh:name: suitableForDiet
sh:property.sh:description: Indicates a dietary restriction or guideline for which this recipe or menu item is suitable, e.g. diabetic, halal etc.

sh:property.sh:name: cookTime
sh:property.sh:description: The time it takes to actually cook the dish, in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A recipe. For dietary restrictions covered by the recipe, a few common restrictions are enumerated via [[suitableForDiet]]. The [[keywords]] property can also be used to add more detail.

sh:property.sh:name: recipeCuisine
sh:property.sh:description: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, French or Ethiopian).

sh:property.sh:name: nutrition
sh:property.sh:description: Nutrition information about the recipe or menu item.

sh:property.sh:name: recipeCategory
sh:property.sh:description: The category of the recipe—for example, appetizer, entree, etc.

sh:property.sh:name: recipeInstructions
sh:property.sh:description: A step in making the recipe, in the form of a single item (document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Recipe

sh:property.sh:name: estimatedCost
sh:property.sh:description: The estimated cost of the supply or supplies consumed when performing instructions.

sh:property.sh:name: steps
sh:property.sh:description: The steps in the form of a single item (text, document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.

sh:property.sh:name: yield
sh:property.sh:description: The quantity that results by performing instructions. For example, a paper airplane, 10 personalized candles.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: How to

sh:property.sh:name: totalTime
sh:property.sh:description: The total time required to perform instructions or a direction (including time to prepare the supplies), in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

sh:property.sh:name: performTime
sh:property.sh:description: The length of time it takes to perform instructions or a direction (not including time to prepare the supplies), in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Instructions that explain how to achieve a result by performing a sequence of steps.

sh:property.sh:name: prepTime
sh:property.sh:description: The length of time it takes to prepare the items to be used in instructions or a direction, in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

sh:property.sh:name: tool
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. An object used (but not consumed) when performing instructions or a direction.

sh:property.sh:name: supply
sh:property.sh:description: A sub-property of instrument. A supply consumed when performing instructions or a direction.

sh:property.sh:name: recipeYield
sh:property.sh:description: The quantity produced by the recipe (for example, number of people served, number of servings, etc).

sh:property.sh:name: foodEvent
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of location. The specific food event where the action occurred.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Food event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Food event.

sh:property.sh:name: foodEstablishment
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of location. The specific food establishment where the action occurred.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Cook action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of producing/preparing food.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Conversation
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: One or more messages between organizations or people on a particular topic. Individual messages can be linked to the conversation with isPartOf or hasPart properties.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: IITCNRit
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: This element is based on work by the Web Applications for the Future Internet Lab, Institute of Informatics and Telematics, Pisa, Italy.

sh:property.sh:name: followee
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of object. The person or organization being followed.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Follow action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of forming a personal connection with someone/something (object) unidirectionally/asymmetrically to get updates polled from.

Related actions:

* [[BefriendAction]]: Unlike BefriendAction, FollowAction implies that the connection is *not* necessarily reciprocal.
* [[SubscribeAction]]: Unlike SubscribeAction, FollowAction implies that the follower acts as an active agent constantly/actively polling for updates.
* [[RegisterAction]]: Unlike RegisterAction, FollowAction implies that the agent is interested in continuing receiving updates from the object.
* [[JoinAction]]: Unlike JoinAction, FollowAction implies that the agent is interested in getting updates from the object.
* [[TrackAction]]: Unlike TrackAction, FollowAction refers to the polling of updates of all aspects of animate objects rather than the location of inanimate objects (e.g. you track a package, but you don't follow it).

sh:property.sh:name: inventoryLevel
sh:property.sh:description: The current approximate inventory level for the item or items.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Some products
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A placeholder for multiple similar products of the same kind.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Tire shop
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A tire shop.

schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:label: Event scheduled
schema:EventStatusType.rdfs:comment: The event is taking place or has taken place on the startDate as scheduled. Use of this value is optional, as it is assumed by default.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Preschool
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A preschool.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Energy
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Properties that take Energy as values are of the form '<Number> <Energy unit of measure>'.

schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:label: Reservation confirmed
schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:comment: The status of a confirmed reservation.

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:property.sh:name: deliveryMethod
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. The method of delivery.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Send action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of physically/electronically dispatching an object for transfer from an origin to a destination.Related actions:

* [[ReceiveAction]]: The reciprocal of SendAction.
* [[GiveAction]]: Unlike GiveAction, SendAction does not imply the transfer of ownership (e.g. I can send you my laptop, but I'm not necessarily giving it to you).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Season
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A media season e.g. tv, radio, video game etc.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Hindu temple
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A Hindu temple.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Series
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A Series in schema.org is a group of related items, typically but not necessarily of the same kind.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Motorcycle repair
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A motorcycle repair shop.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Buddhist temple
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A Buddhist temple.

schema:PaymentStatusType.rdfs:label: Payment past due
schema:PaymentStatusType.rdfs:comment: The payment is due and considered late.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: Tourism
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: This element is based on the work of the [Tourism Structured Web Data Community Group](https://www.w3.org/community/tourismdata).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Legal service
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A LegalService is a business that provides legally-oriented services, advice and representation, e.g. law firms.\n\nAs a [[LocalBusiness]] it can be described as a [[provider]] of one or more [[Service]]\(s).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Attorney
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Professional service: Attorney. \n\nThis type is deprecated - [[LegalService]] is more inclusive and less ambiguous.

sh:property.sh:name: distance
sh:property.sh:description: The distance travelled, e.g. exercising or travelling.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Travel action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of traveling from an fromLocation to a destination by a specified mode of transport, optionally with participants.

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Thursday
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: The day of the week between Wednesday and Friday.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Register action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of registering to be a user of a service, product or web page.

Related actions:

* [[JoinAction]]: Unlike JoinAction, RegisterAction implies you are registering to be a user of a service, *not* a group/team of people.
* [FollowAction]]: Unlike FollowAction, RegisterAction doesn't imply that the agent is expecting to poll for updates from the object.
* [[SubscribeAction]]: Unlike SubscribeAction, RegisterAction doesn't imply that the agent is expecting updates from the object.

schema:ItemListOrderType.rdfs:label: Item list order ascending
schema:ItemListOrderType.rdfs:comment: An ItemList ordered with lower values listed first.

sh:property.sh:name: deliveryMethod
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. The method of delivery.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Order action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An agent orders an object/product/service to be delivered/sent.

sh:property.sh:name: loser
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The loser of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Win action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of achieving victory in a competitive activity.

schema:DeliveryMethod.rdfs:label: On site pickup
schema:DeliveryMethod.rdfs:comment: A DeliveryMethod in which an item is collected on site, e.g. in a store or at a box office.

sh:property.sh:name: amount
sh:property.sh:description: The amount of money.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Investment or deposit
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A type of financial product that typically requires the client to transfer funds to a financial service in return for potential beneficial financial return.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Bank account
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A product or service offered by a bank whereby one may deposit, withdraw or transfer money and in some cases be paid interest.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Deposit account
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A type of Bank Account with a main purpose of depositing funds to gain interest or other benefits.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Control action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An agent controls a device or application.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Deactivate action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of stopping or deactivating a device or application (e.g. stopping a timer or turning off a flashlight).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Tattoo parlor
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A tattoo parlor.

schema:SteeringPositionValue.rdfs:label: Right hand driving
schema:SteeringPositionValue.rdfs:comment: The steering position is on the right side of the vehicle (viewed from the main direction of driving).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Arrive action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of arriving at a place. An agent arrives at a destination from a fromLocation, optionally with participants.

schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:label: Hindu diet
schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:comment: A diet conforming to Hindu dietary practices, in particular, beef-free.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: School
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A school.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Self storage
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A self-storage facility.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Video gallery
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Web page type: Video gallery page.

schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:label: Halal diet
schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:comment: A diet conforming to Islamic dietary practices.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Music venue
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A music venue.

sh:property.sh:name: issn
sh:property.sh:description: The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.

sh:property.sh:name: blogPosts
sh:property.sh:description: The postings that are part of this blog.

sh:property.sh:name: blogPost
sh:property.sh:description: A posting that is part of this blog.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Blog
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A blog.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Performing arts theater
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A theater or other performing art center.

schema:BoardingPolicyType.rdfs:label: Zone boarding policy
schema:BoardingPolicyType.rdfs:comment: The airline boards by zones of the plane.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Motorcycle dealer
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A motorcycle dealer.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Eat action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of swallowing solid objects.

schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:label: Order returned
schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:comment: OrderStatus representing that an order has been returned.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: URL
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Data type: URL.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: View action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of consuming static visual content.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: QAPage
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A QAPage is a WebPage focussed on a specific Question and its Answer(s), e.g. in a question answering site or documenting Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs).

schema:ActionStatusType.rdfs:label: Failed action status
schema:ActionStatusType.rdfs:comment: An action that failed to complete. The action's error property and the HTTP return code contain more information about the failure.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: User page visits
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use [[Action]]-based vocabulary, alongside types such as [[Comment]].

sh:property.sh:name: lender
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The person that lends the object being borrowed.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Borrow action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of obtaining an object under an agreement to return it at a later date. Reciprocal of LendAction.

Related actions:

* [[LendAction]]: Reciprocal of BorrowAction.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Stadium or arena
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A stadium.

sh:property.sh:name: screenCount
sh:property.sh:description: The number of screens in the movie theater.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Movie theater
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A movie theater.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Recycling center
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A recycling center.

schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:label: Pre order
schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is available for pre-order, but will be delivered when generally available.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Clothing store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A clothing store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Auto rental
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A car rental business.

schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:label: Refurbished condition
schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is refurbished.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Dance event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: A social dance.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Pawn shop
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A shop that will buy, or lend money against the security of, personal possessions.

sh:property.sh:name: offers
sh:property.sh:description: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.

sh:property.sh:name: offerCount
sh:property.sh:description: The number of offers for the product.

sh:property.sh:name: lowPrice
sh:property.sh:description: The lowest price of all offers available.

sh:property.sh:name: highPrice
sh:property.sh:description: The highest price of all offers available.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Aggregate offer
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: When a single product is associated with multiple offers (for example, the same pair of shoes is offered by different merchants), then AggregateOffer can be used.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Hospital
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A hospital.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Cemetery
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A graveyard.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Like action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of expressing a positive sentiment about the object. An agent likes an object (a proposition, topic or theme) with participants.

sh:property.sh:name: tickerSymbol
sh:property.sh:description: The exchange traded instrument associated with a Corporation object. The tickerSymbol is expressed as an exchange and an instrument name separated by a space character. For the exchange component of the tickerSymbol attribute, we reccommend using the controlled vocaulary of Market Identifier Codes (MIC) specified in ISO15022.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Corporation
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Organization: A business corporation.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Scholarly article
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A scholarly article.

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Wednesday
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: The day of the week between Tuesday and Thursday.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Child care
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A Childcare center.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Take action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of gaining ownership of an object from an origin. Reciprocal of GiveAction.

Related actions:

* [[GiveAction]]: The reciprocal of TakeAction.
* [[ReceiveAction]]: Unlike ReceiveAction, TakeAction implies that ownership has been transfered.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: House painter
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A house painting service.

schema:GameServerStatus.rdfs:label: Offline temporarily
schema:GameServerStatus.rdfs:comment: Game server status: OfflineTemporarily. Server is offline now but it can be online soon.

schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:label: Used condition
schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is used.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Music event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Music event.

schema:DriveWheelConfigurationValue.rdfs:label: Four wheel drive configuration
schema:DriveWheelConfigurationValue.rdfs:comment: Four-wheel drive is a transmission layout where the engine primarily drives two wheels with a part-time four-wheel drive capability.

schema:PaymentStatusType.rdfs:label: Payment automatically applied
schema:PaymentStatusType.rdfs:comment: An automatic payment system is in place and will be used.

schema:ItemListOrderType.rdfs:label: Item list order descending
schema:ItemListOrderType.rdfs:comment: An ItemList ordered with higher values listed first.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Fire station
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A fire station. With firemen.

schema:PaymentStatusType.rdfs:label: Payment complete
schema:PaymentStatusType.rdfs:comment: The payment has been received and processed.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A book.

sh:property.sh:name: bookEdition
sh:property.sh:description: The edition of the book.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Book

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfPages
sh:property.sh:description: The number of pages in the book.

sh:property.sh:name: bookFormat
sh:property.sh:description: The format of the book.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Book format type
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The publication format of the book.

sh:property.sh:name: illustrator
sh:property.sh:description: The illustrator of the book.

sh:property.sh:name: isbn
sh:property.sh:description: The ISBN of the book.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Amusement park
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An amusement park.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Confirm action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of notifying someone that a future event/action is going to happen as expected.

Related actions:

* [[CancelAction]]: The antonym of ConfirmAction.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Item page
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A page devoted to a single item, such as a particular product or hotel.

sh:property.sh:name: toRecipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of recipient. The recipient who was directly sent the message.

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:property.sh:name: dateRead
sh:property.sh:description: The date/time at which the message has been read by the recipient if a single recipient exists.

sh:property.sh:name: sender
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the sending end of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A single message from a sender to one or more organizations or people.

sh:property.sh:name: messageAttachment
sh:property.sh:description: A CreativeWork attached to the message.

sh:property.sh:name: dateReceived
sh:property.sh:description: The date/time the message was received if a single recipient exists.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Message

sh:property.sh:name: ccRecipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of recipient. The recipient copied on a message.

sh:property.sh:name: dateSent
sh:property.sh:description: The date/time at which the message was sent.

sh:property.sh:name: bccRecipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of recipient. The recipient blind copied on a message.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Email message
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An email message.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Barcode
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An image of a visual machine-readable code such as a barcode or QR code.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Dislike action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of expressing a negative sentiment about the object. An agent dislikes an object (a proposition, topic or theme) with participants.

sh:property.sh:name: replacer
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of object. The object that replaces.

sh:property.sh:name: replacee
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of object. The object that is being replaced.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Replace action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of editing a recipient by replacing an old object with a new object.

schema:GamePlayMode.rdfs:label: Co op
schema:GamePlayMode.rdfs:comment: Play mode: CoOp. Co-operative games, where you play on the same team with friends.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: How to tip
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An explanation in the instructions for how to achieve a result. It provides supplementary information about a technique, supply, author's preference, etc. It can explain what could be done, or what should not be done, but doesn't specify what should be done (see HowToDirection).

sh:property.sh:name: query
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. The query used on this action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Search action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of searching for an object.

Related actions:

* [[FindAction]]: SearchAction generally leads to a FindAction, but not necessarily.

sh:property.sh:name: pickupTime
sh:property.sh:description: When a taxi will pickup a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.

sh:property.sh:name: pickupLocation
sh:property.sh:description: Where a taxi will pick up a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.

sh:property.sh:name: dropoffTime
sh:property.sh:description: When a rental car can be dropped off.

sh:property.sh:name: dropoffLocation
sh:property.sh:description: Where a rental car can be dropped off.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Rental car reservation
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A reservation for a rental car.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations.

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Donate action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of providing goods, services, or money without compensation, often for philanthropic reasons.

sh:property.sh:name: event
sh:property.sh:description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Invite action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of asking someone to attend an event. Reciprocal of RsvpAction.

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Tip action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of giving money voluntarily to a beneficiary in recognition of services rendered.

sh:property.sh:name: appliesToPaymentMethod
sh:property.sh:description: The payment method(s) to which the payment charge specification applies.

sh:property.sh:name: appliesToDeliveryMethod
sh:property.sh:description: The delivery method(s) to which the delivery charge or payment charge specification applies.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Payment charge specification
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The costs of settling the payment using a particular payment method.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Install action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of installing an application.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Art gallery
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An art gallery.

sh:property.sh:name: serialNumber
sh:property.sh:description: The serial number or any alphanumeric identifier of a particular product. When attached to an offer, it is a shortcut for the serial number of the product included in the offer.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Individual product
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A single, identifiable product instance (e.g. a laptop with a particular serial number).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Mountain
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A mountain, like Mount Whitney or Mount Everest.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Auto dealer
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An car dealership.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Music store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A music store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Film action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of capturing sound and moving images on film, video, or digitally.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Middle school
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A middle school (typically for children aged around 11-14, although this varies somewhat).

sh:property.sh:name: partOfTVSeries
sh:property.sh:description: The TV series to which this episode or season belongs.

sh:property.sh:name: countryOfOrigin
sh:property.sh:description: The country of the principal offices of the production company or individual responsible for the movie or program.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: TVSeason
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Season dedicated to TV broadcast and associated online delivery.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Electrician
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An electrician.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Suspend action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of momentarily pausing a device or application (e.g. pause music playback or pause a timer).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Prepend action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of inserting at the beginning if an ordered collection.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Quote action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An agent quotes/estimates/appraises an object/product/service with a price at a location/store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Currency conversion service
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A service to convert funds from one currency to another currency.

schema:RsvpResponseType.rdfs:label: Rsvp response maybe
schema:RsvpResponseType.rdfs:comment: The invitee may or may not attend.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Painting
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A painting.

sh:property.sh:name: event
sh:property.sh:description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Leave action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
An agent leaves an event / group with participants/friends at a location.

Related actions:

* [[JoinAction]]: The antonym of LeaveAction.
* [[UnRegisterAction]]: Unlike UnRegisterAction, LeaveAction implies leaving a group/team of people rather than a service.

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Tuesday
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: The day of the week between Monday and Wednesday.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Check action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An agent inspects, determines, investigates, inquires, or examines an object's accuracy, quality, condition, or state.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Grocery store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A grocery store.

A DatedMoneySpecification represents monetary values with optional start and end dates. For example, this could represent an employee's salary over a specific period of time. __Note:__ This type has been superseded by [[MonetaryAmount]] use of that type is recommended
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Dated money specification

sh:property.sh:name: endDate
sh:property.sh:description: The end date and time of the item (in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601)).

sh:property.sh:name: startDate
sh:property.sh:description: The start date and time of the item (in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601)).

sh:property.sh:name: currency
sh:property.sh:description: The currency in which the monetary amount is expressed (in 3-letter [ISO 4217](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format).

sh:property.sh:name: amount
sh:property.sh:description: The amount of money.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Time
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A point in time recurring on multiple days in the form hh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm] (see [XML schema for details](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time)).

schema:DriveWheelConfigurationValue.rdfs:label: Rear wheel drive configuration
schema:DriveWheelConfigurationValue.rdfs:comment: Real-wheel drive is a transmission layout where the engine drives the rear wheels.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: About page
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Web page type: About page.

sh:property.sh:name: browserRequirements
sh:property.sh:description: Specifies browser requirements in human-readable text. For example, 'requires HTML5 support'.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Web application
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Web applications.

sh:property.sh:name: ineligibleRegion
sh:property.sh:description: The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is not valid, e.g. a region where the transaction is not allowed.\n\nSee also [[eligibleRegion]].

sh:property.sh:name: eligibleRegion
sh:property.sh:description: The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is valid.\n\nSee also [[ineligibleRegion]].

sh:property.sh:name: areaServed
sh:property.sh:description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

sh:property.sh:name: appliesToDeliveryMethod
sh:property.sh:description: The delivery method(s) to which the delivery charge or payment charge specification applies.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Delivery charge specification
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The price for the delivery of an offer using a particular delivery method.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Pond
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A pond.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Motel
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
A motel.

See also the dedicated document on the use of schema.org for marking up hotels and other forms of accommodations.

sh:property.sh:name: recipient
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Give action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of transferring ownership of an object to a destination. Reciprocal of TakeAction.

Related actions:

* [[TakeAction]]: Reciprocal of GiveAction.
* [[SendAction]]: Unlike SendAction, GiveAction implies that ownership is being transferred (e.g. I may send my laptop to you, but that doesn't mean I'm giving it to you).

schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:label: Reservation cancelled
schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:comment: The status for a previously confirmed reservation that is now cancelled.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Business event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Business event.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Reserve action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Reserving a concrete object. Related actions: * [[ScheduleAction]]: Unlike ScheduleAction, ReserveAction reserves concrete objects (e.g. a table, a hotel) towards a time slot / spatial allocation.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Moving company
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A moving company.

sh:property.sh:name: warrantyPromise
sh:property.sh:description: The warranty promise(s) included in the offer.

sh:property.sh:name: buyer
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant/person/organization that bought the object.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Sell action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of taking money from a buyer in exchange for goods or services rendered. An agent sells an object, product, or service to a buyer for a price. Reciprocal of BuyAction.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Video game clip
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A short segment/part of a video game.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Garden store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A garden store.

schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:label: Discontinued
schema:ItemAvailability.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item has been discontinued.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Catholic church
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A Catholic church.

schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:label: Vegan diet
schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:comment: A diet exclusive of all animal products.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Bridge
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A bridge.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Physician
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A doctor's office.

schema:ItemListOrderType.rdfs:label: Item list unordered
schema:ItemListOrderType.rdfs:comment: An ItemList ordered with no explicit order.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Delete action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of editing a recipient by removing one of its objects.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Date
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A date value in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Subscribe action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of forming a personal connection with someone/something (object) unidirectionally/asymmetrically to get updates pushed to.

Related actions:

* [[FollowAction]]: Unlike FollowAction, SubscribeAction implies that the subscriber acts as a passive agent being constantly/actively pushed for updates.
* [[RegisterAction]]: Unlike RegisterAction, SubscribeAction implies that the agent is interested in continuing receiving updates from the object.
* [[JoinAction]]: Unlike JoinAction, SubscribeAction implies that the agent is interested in continuing receiving updates from the object.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Table
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A table on a Web page.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: FIBO
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: This element is based on the work of the Financial Industry Business Ontology project (see [http://www.fibo.org/schema](http://www.fibo.org/schema) for details), in support of the W3C Financial Industry Business Ontology Community Group ([http://www.fibo.org/community](http://www.fibo.org/community)). Many class and property definitions are inspired by or based on [http://www.fibo.org](http://www.fibo.org).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Professional service
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Original definition: "provider of professional services."\n\nThe general [[ProfessionalService]] type for local businesses was deprecated due to confusion with [[Service]]. For reference, the types that it included were: [[Dentist]], [[AccountingService]], [[Attorney]], [[Notary]], as well as types for several kinds of [[HomeAndConstructionBusiness]]: [[Electrician]], [[GeneralContractor]], [[HousePainter]], [[Locksmith]], [[Plumber]], [[RoofingContractor]]. [[LegalService]] was introduced as a more inclusive supertype of [[Attorney]].

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: High school
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A high school.

schema:DriveWheelConfigurationValue.rdfs:label: Front wheel drive configuration
schema:DriveWheelConfigurationValue.rdfs:comment: Front-wheel drive is a transmission layout where the engine drives the front wheels.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Note digital document
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A file containing a note, primarily for the author.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Number
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Data type: Number.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Cancel action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of asserting that a future event/action is no longer going to happen.

Related actions:

* [[ConfirmAction]]: The antonym of CancelAction.

sh:property.sh:name: pickupTime
sh:property.sh:description: When a taxi will pickup a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.

sh:property.sh:name: pickupLocation
sh:property.sh:description: Where a taxi will pick up a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.

sh:property.sh:name: partySize
sh:property.sh:description: Number of people the reservation should accommodate.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Taxi reservation
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A reservation for a taxi.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, use [[Offer]].

sh:property.sh:name: videoFormat
sh:property.sh:description: The type of screening or video broadcast used (e.g. IMAX, 3D, SD, HD, etc.).

sh:property.sh:name: isLiveBroadcast
sh:property.sh:description: True is the broadcast is of a live event.

sh:property.sh:name: broadcastOfEvent
sh:property.sh:description: The event being broadcast such as a sporting event or awards ceremony.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Broadcast event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An over the air or online broadcast event.

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Public holidays
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: This stands for any day that is a public holiday; it is a placeholder for all official public holidays in some particular location. While not technically a "day of the week", it can be used with [[OpeningHoursSpecification]]. In the context of an opening hours specification it can be used to indicate opening hours on public holidays, overriding general opening hours for the day of the week on which a public holiday occurs.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Watch action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of consuming dynamic/moving visual content.

schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:label: Reservation pending
schema:ReservationStatusType.rdfs:comment: The status of a reservation when a request has been sent, but not confirmed.

sh:property.sh:name: childMinAge
sh:property.sh:description: Minimal age of the child.

sh:property.sh:name: childMaxAge
sh:property.sh:description: Maximal age of the child.

sh:property.sh:name: requiredGender
sh:property.sh:description: Audiences defined by a person's gender.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: People audience

sh:property.sh:name: requiredMinAge
sh:property.sh:description: Audiences defined by a person's minimum age.

sh:property.sh:name: requiredMaxAge
sh:property.sh:description: Audiences defined by a person's maximum age.

sh:property.sh:name: suggestedMaxAge
sh:property.sh:description: Maximal age recommended for viewing content.

sh:property.sh:name: suggestedMinAge
sh:property.sh:description: Minimal age recommended for viewing content.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A set of characteristics belonging to people, e.g. who compose an item's target audience.

sh:property.sh:name: suggestedGender
sh:property.sh:description: The gender of the person or audience.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Parent audience
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A set of characteristics describing parents, who can be interested in viewing some content.

sh:property.sh:name: realEstateAgent
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The real estate agent involved in the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Real estate agent
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A real-estate agent.

sh:property.sh:name: landlord
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The owner of the real estate property.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Rent action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of giving money in return for temporary use, but not ownership, of an object such as a vehicle or property. For example, an agent rents a property from a landlord in exchange for a periodic payment.

A reservation for lodging at a hotel, motel, inn, etc.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations.

sh:property.sh:name: checkinTime
sh:property.sh:description: The earliest someone may check into a lodging establishment.

sh:property.sh:name: numAdults
sh:property.sh:description: The number of adults staying in the unit.

sh:property.sh:name: checkoutTime
sh:property.sh:description: The latest someone may check out of a lodging establishment.

sh:property.sh:name: numChildren
sh:property.sh:description: The number of children staying in the unit.

sh:property.sh:name: lodgingUnitDescription
sh:property.sh:description: A full description of the lodging unit.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Lodging reservation

sh:property.sh:name: lodgingUnitType
sh:property.sh:description: Textual description of the unit type (including suite vs. room, size of bed, etc.).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: User checkins
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use [[Action]]-based vocabulary, alongside types such as [[Comment]].

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Playground
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A playground.

schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:label: Order processing
schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:comment: OrderStatus representing that an order is being processed.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: WPFooter
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The footer section of the page.

schema:DigitalDocumentPermissionType.rdfs:label: Write permission
schema:DigitalDocumentPermissionType.rdfs:comment: Permission to write or edit the document.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Event reservation
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A reservation for an event like a concert, sporting event, or lecture.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, use [[Offer]].

schema:MapCategoryType.rdfs:label: Venue map
schema:MapCategoryType.rdfs:comment: A venue map (e.g. for malls, auditoriums, museums, etc.).

schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:label: Vegetarian diet
schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:comment: A diet exclusive of animal meat.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Activate action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of starting or activating a device or application (e.g. starting a timer or turning on a flashlight).

sh:property.sh:name: winner
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The winner of the action.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Lose action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of being defeated in a competitive activity.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Roofing contractor
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A roofing contractor.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: User tweets
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use [[Action]]-based vocabulary, alongside types such as [[Comment]].

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Comedy event
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Event type: Comedy event.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: User likes
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: UserInteraction and its subtypes is an old way of talking about users interacting with pages. It is generally better to use [[Action]]-based vocabulary, alongside types such as [[Comment]].

sh:property.sh:name: sender
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the sending end of the action.

sh:property.sh:name: deliveryMethod
sh:property.sh:description: A sub property of instrument. The method of delivery.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Receive action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of physically/electronically taking delivery of an object thathas been transferred from an origin to a destination. Reciprocal of SendAction.

Related actions:

* [[SendAction]]: The reciprocal of ReceiveAction.
* [[TakeAction]]: Unlike TakeAction, ReceiveAction does not imply that the ownership has been transfered (e.g. I can receive a package, but it does not mean the package is now mine).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: NGO
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Organization: Non-governmental Organization.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Bar or pub
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A bar or pub.

schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:label: Order pickup available
schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:comment: OrderStatus representing availability of an order for pickup.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Resume action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The act of resuming a device or application which was formerly paused (e.g. resume music playback or resume a timer).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Resort
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
A resort is a place used for relaxation or recreation, attracting visitors for holidays or vacations. Resorts are places, towns or sometimes commercial establishment operated by a single company (Source: Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resort).

See also the dedicated document on the use of schema.org for marking up hotels and other forms of accommodations.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Mens clothing store
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A men's clothing store.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Un register action
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
The act of un-registering from a service.

Related actions:

* [[RegisterAction]]: antonym of UnRegisterAction.
* [[Leave]]: Unlike LeaveAction, UnRegisterAction implies that you are unregistering from a service you werer previously registered, rather than leaving a team/group of people.

schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:label: Damaged condition
schema:OfferItemCondition.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the item is damaged.

schema:Organization.rdfs:label: MBZ
schema:Organization.rdfs:comment: This vocabulary was improved through collaboration with the MusicBrainz project ([www.musicbrainz.org](http://www.musicbrainz.org)), and is partially inspired by the MusicBrainz and [Music Ontology](http://musicontology.com/docs/getting-started.html) schemas.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Bank or credit union
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Bank or credit union.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: River body of water
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A river (for example, the broad majestic Shannon).

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Sunday
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: The day of the week between Saturday and Monday.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Florist
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A florist.

schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:label: Order problem
schema:OrderStatus.rdfs:comment: OrderStatus representing that there is a problem with the order.

schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:label: Low fat diet
schema:RestrictedDiet.rdfs:comment: A diet focused on reduced fat and cholesterol intake.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Hotel
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment:
A hotel is an establishment that provides lodging paid on a short-term basis (Source: Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hotel).

See also the dedicated document on the use of schema.org for marking up hotels and other forms of accommodations.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Adult entertainment
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An adult entertainment establishment.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Profile page
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Web page type: Profile page.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Embassy
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An embassy.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Notary
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A notary.

schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:label: Monday
schema:DayOfWeek.rdfs:comment: The day of the week between Sunday and Tuesday.

sh:property.sh:name: serverStatus
sh:property.sh:description: Status of a game server.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Game server status
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Status of a game server.

sh:property.sh:name: playersOnline
sh:property.sh:description: Number of players on the server.

sh:property.sh:name: game
sh:property.sh:description: Video game which is played on this server.

sh:property.sh:name: directors
sh:property.sh:description: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video games etc. content. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:property.sh:name: director
sh:property.sh:description: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Video game

sh:property.sh:name: cheatCode
sh:property.sh:description: Cheat codes to the game.

sh:property.sh:name: gameTip
sh:property.sh:description: Links to tips, tactics, etc.

sh:property.sh:name: gamePlatform
sh:property.sh:description: The electronic systems used to play video games.

sh:property.sh:name: actors
sh:property.sh:description: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A video game is an electronic game that involves human interaction with a user interface to generate visual feedback on a video device.

sh:property.sh:name: playMode
sh:property.sh:description: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player. The game can be marked as multi-player, co-op and single-player at the same time.

sh:property.sh:name: trailer
sh:property.sh:description: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

sh:property.sh:name: musicBy
sh:property.sh:description: The composer of the soundtrack.

sh:property.sh:name: gameLocation
sh:property.sh:description: Real or fictional location of the game (or part of game).

sh:property.sh:name: numberOfPlayers
sh:property.sh:description: Indicate how many people can play this game (minimum, maximum, or range).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: The Game type represents things which are games. These are typically rule-governed recreational activities, e.g. role-playing games in which players assume the role of characters in a fictional setting.

sh:property.sh:name: gameItem
sh:property.sh:description: An item is an object within the game world that can be collected by a player or, occasionally, a non-player character.

sh:property.sh:name: quest
sh:property.sh:description: The task that a player-controlled character, or group of characters may complete in order to gain a reward.

sh:property.sh:name: characterAttribute
sh:property.sh:description: A piece of data that represents a particular aspect of a fictional character (skill, power, character points, advantage, disadvantage).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Game

sh:property.sh:name: gameServer
sh:property.sh:description: The server on which it is possible to play the game.

sh:property.sh:name: actor
sh:property.sh:description: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Game server
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: Server that provides game interaction in a multiplayer game.

sh:property.sh:name: hasCourseInstance
sh:property.sh:description: An offering of the course at a specific time and place or through specific media or mode of study or to a specific section of students.

sh:property.sh:name: instructor
sh:property.sh:description: A person assigned to instruct or provide instructional assistance for the [[CourseInstance]].

sh:property.sh:name: courseMode
sh:property.sh:description: The medium or means of delivery of the course instance or the mode of study, either as a text label (e.g. "online", "onsite" or "blended"; "synchronous" or "asynchronous"; "full-time" or "part-time") or as a URL reference to a term from a controlled vocabulary (e.g. https://ceds.ed.gov/element/001311#Asynchronous ).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Course instance
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: An instance of a [[Course]] which is distinct from other instances because it is offered at a different time or location or through different media or modes of study or to a specific section of students.

sh:property.sh:name: coursePrerequisites
sh:property.sh:description: Requirements for taking the Course. May be completion of another [[Course]] or a textual description like "permission of instructor". Requirements may be a pre-requisite competency, referenced using [[AlignmentObject]].

sh:property.sh:name: courseCode
sh:property.sh:description: The identifier for the [[Course]] used by the course [[provider]] (e.g. CS101 or 6.001).

sh:NodeShape.rdfs:label: Course
sh:NodeShape.rdfs:comment: A description of an educational course which may be offered as distinct instances at which take place at different times or take place at different locations, or be offered through different media or modes of study. An educational course is a sequence of one or more educational events and/or creative works which aims to build knowledge, competence or ability of learners.
